name: markdown-it-playground
description: Markdown-it plugin for embedded code demos.

scripts.build-browser: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && browserify lib/index.js -o dist/markdown-it-block-embed.js -t [ babelify ]
scripts.test: npm run test-lint && npm run test-spec
scripts.test-ci: npm run test-lint && npm run test-coverage-ci
scripts.test-coverage-ci: rm -rf coverage && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat coverage/lcov.info | node node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf coverage

author: Ryan Keller
